Her horns extended further from her forehead, and her eyes ceased to simply be colored red; they now actively glowed with a demonic aura.

"I'm beautiful," she laughed, her voice a feminine rumble. "And unstoppable. This whole world is my playground..."
12112221.title: Alexi's Reign

choices: She accepts her new role as Alexi's doll and tries to make the most of it.
She refuses to become a doll to her own daughter, and Alexi punishes her.
121122212.content:
Alexi smirked deviously as she thought about what she would do next. She was already powerful beyond belief, and devouring her mother had given her even greater power still. She was all but invincible now, the entire world was hers to do with as she wished. The transformation to her physical appearance was also was magnificent. Her once child-like body, which had no almost curves to speak of, had grown and stretched into a much more mature form that was almost as curvaceous and beautiful as her mother's was.

As Alexi stood and admired her new sexy form, she decided that it was time to plan what to do next. Sure she could easily go straight into town and get her revenge on her former family, but Alexi wanted to have some fun with her new powers first. And she had special plans for exactly how she wanted to entertain herself. Reaching down into the rubble of her destroyed home, Alexi dug around until she found one of her old dolls. It was an old gift that Lydia had made for her when she had first been adopted: a magical doll that took on the shape of its owner.

Alexi held back a laugh as she examined the doll, as it was a replica of what she had looked like before. Seeing how childish the doll's appearance was and comparing it to her current goddess-like form, Alexi almost couldn't believe that she had ever looked like that. Using her new magic powers, Alexi made the tiny doll begin to grow in the palm of her hand. It continued to expand until it was 50 feet tall, and while this made the doll tower over normal humans like a giantess, it still only came up to the knee of the now 200 foot tall Alexi.

Placing the doll on the ground at her feet, Alexi began with the next phase of her plan. Concentrating her magic power, Alexi created an orb of energy in the palm of her hand. She then watched as that energy began to take on a familiar form. Within moments, the energy had manifested itself as the spirit of the recently digested Lydia, and Alexi smiled playfully as her mother's ghost stood in the palm of her hand.

"Welcome back, mommy. So tell me, what was it like in there? How did it feel to be eaten and digested by your precious little girl?"

Lydia was filled with rage as she began to recall the incidents that had lead up to her death.

"What do you think?! It was terrible! Why would you do such a thing to me, Alexi?! I took you in when you had nowhere to go, I raised you as my own daughter, I even granted you a piece of my unlimited power so that you could rule by my side! I gave you everything, and this is how you repay me?!"

"Oh, I see that somebody is still a little cranky. But don't worry, mom. I have something special in mind for you that will make things much better." Alexi said with a giggle.

She then used her magic to levitate the giant doll into the air and shoved her mother's ghost inside of it. Alexi then watched gleefully as her doll sprung to life. Its eyes glowed a demonic red, and its ball-jointed limbs began to move. Lydia looked at her new body in shock, quickly realizing that her spirit was now inhabiting the doll she had made as a replica of Alexi when she first adopted her. While disappointed that her new form had none of the luscious curves that her former body did, Lydia was admittedly glad that she at least had a body again.

"So, what do you think about this, mom? You're gonna be my doll now, so I'm going to be the one calling the shots from now on. But since I know how badly you wanted to get your revenge on the royal family for banishing you, I decided that I'd be nice and make you big enough to use them as your own dolls! Basically, whenever I'm not playing with you myself, I'm gonna give you permission to go and wreak havoc on the kingdom. I'd say it's a pretty good deal for the both of us, right mommy?"

Lydia didn't know how to respond. On one hand, she was being given a second chance at life, even if it was in the body of a doll version of her daughter. With this she could finally have her revenge against all those who had wronged her, and she would still be able to rule over the puny humans below her, though to a much lesser extent than she had initially intended. Perhaps if she played her cards right, she might even be able to regain the power that Alexi had drained from her and regain her position as the one in control. On the other hand, though, she was now nothing but a plaything for her daughter. Alexi could do anything she wanted to her, and she was helpless to stop her. Being dominated and controlled like that by the girl she had raised as her own daughter might just be too much for Lydia's pride to take. Would she be able to handle this new exchange of authority?


How does Lydia react to this?
121122212.title: Lydia's Rebirth: Alexi's New Doll

Alexi goes to the kingdom, dragging Lydia along
1211222122.content:
Lydia couldn't handle this. She was to be a god, not the plaything of a spoiled child. Her own pride and rage were getting the better of her common sense, and she refused to allow this charade to continue.

"I will not submit to you, child!" she hissed. "I don't care how large you get!"

Alexi frowned slightly. "Oh, I can get really large, mommy," she snapped. "And right now, I'm the one in charge. If you won't play by my rules, then I'll just use you however I like."

Without giving any more concern to Lydia's well-being, the giant girl scooped her doll up. "It's time to play..."

choices: Tie Lydia down and make her watch as she demolishes the entire kingdom.
Control Lydia as a puppet and make her demolish the kingdom.
12112221222.content:
Alexi had big plans for the kingdom of Widowwood, and she wanted to get started as soon as possible. Without a second thought, Alexi grabbed the doll that now housed her mother's soul and scooped it off the ground. She then used her magic to create a rope of pure energy and tied it around the doll's neck. Lydia squirmed throughout the entire process, trying with all her might to resist the strength of her gargantuan daughter, but it was simply no use.

Even if she still had her old body and all of her old power, the sheer difference in size was just too much for Lydia to overcome. Now that she was trapped within the body of a doll, she hardly had any strength at all. If not for her towering size, even an ordinary little girl could overpower her now. With the combination of her even greater size and her superhuman strength, Alexi was able to easily manipulate Lydia's doll body without even trying. Within a matter of moments, Alexi had secured an energy noose around her mother's neck. Giggling maliciously, Alexi carelessly dropped Lydia to the ground.

"Come on, my little toy. We've got work to do." Alexi said as she gave the energy rope a sharp tug.

Lydia felt the rope tighten around her neck, constricting more and more painfully with each time her daughter tugged. If she still had a living body that required air to breath, Lydia would have undoubtedly been choking right now. However, since she was now nothing but a doll, her body didn't need to breath in order to function. In this respect, Lydia was somewhat grateful. Unfortunately for her, while her new doll body was no longer bound by the needs to eat and breath, her daughter had made sure that Lydia would still be able to feel pain for her own amusement.

With another sharp tug of the rope, Lydia fell over onto her back. Alexi then began walking through the forest toward Widowwood, carelessly dragging her doll mother through the dirt behind her. Within mere moments Lydia's body was assailed by intense waves of pain. Her neck burned as the energy rope squeezed around it, and she felt as though her head could be torn off at any moment. Lydia was constantly colliding with trees as she was dragged through the woods, and she could feel every branch that broke off against her plastic body. The tree limbs scraped harshly against her, leaving many scratch marks on her form. She could feel dirt and leaves getting wedged into her joints, making it increasingly difficult and painful to even move her own limbs.

All this time, while Lydia was going through this torture, Alexi wasn't paying a shred of attention to her. She was just casually walking toward her destination, uncaring of the suffering that her toy was being forced to endure. Alexi herself towered over the trees, and while they did scratch against her ankles as she walked, it was barely enough to even register to her. Alexi had only one thing on her mind right now: revenge. She wanted payback against her former family for abusing her to the point that she had to run away, and against all of Widowwood for not doing anything to even try and help her. Alexi was focused on her goal, and she wouldn't let anything stand in her way.

Eventually, Alexi arrived at her destination. With a malicious smile forming on her face, Alexi proceeds to...
12112221222.title: Dragging a doll through the forest

choices: Follow Alexi as she ravages Widowwood
Follow Lydia as she tries to free herself
121122212221.content:
The kingdom was already aware of Alexi's approach; the girl towered over all but the tallest spires of the kingdom, and her thunderous footsteps alerted the palace guards well before she arrived. Just another reason, Lydia thought, even as she was dragged helplessly through the woods, that this girl's recklessness and impatience would ruin everything...

Alexi didn't seem to mind; if anything, she took joy in their attempts to prepare for her. Nothing could, naturally, so she'd just have more fun smashing through their pathetic defenses. She got a tingle just thinking about it.

As she reached the outskirts of the kingdom, she took a moment to stomp a fleeing peasant into oblivion, clearly telegraphing her intentions to the royal guards. She pulled up the binding that leashed her mother, smiling darkly. "Don't want you causing trouble while I'm working," she noted. With a gesture, the rope reformed itself into a series of tight bonds along Lydia's body. Struggle though she may, Lydia couldn't get free from this any more than she'd been able to escape from her enormous daughter.

"You'll regret this, girl," she hissed.

Alexi laughed, insane. "Oh, mommy. We're gonna' have so, so much fun after this," she promised. "And you'll learn to respect me as your master. Even if I have to break you, first."

"I will never-"

Alexi sighed, dropping her to the ground without any ceremony. "I've heard this before," she noted. "Whatever. I'm going to have dinner, or maybe turn this castle into my own personal throne. Whatever I want."

She turned to enter the kingdom, leaving her mother bond and helpless in her wake.

1211222122212.content:
Lydia could only watch helplessly as her monolithic daughter proceeded to stomp toward the kingdom. Her body was battered from being dragged through the woods, and the bindings that Alexi had placed on her were astoundingly powerful. Lydia could hardly believe that her daughter was able to learn and master such an advanced restraint spell so soon.

Up until earlier today, Alexi had shown no interest in magic. While her mother poured all of her energy into studying the dark arts every single day, Alexi would always be off on her own, playing with dolls or something of the like. And yet, now she was casting the even most advanced of spells with ease, everything from basic growth magic to the nigh-impossible art of resurrection.

There was no explanation for how she had so quickly mastered the power that Lydia had given her not even a day ago. The mere thought of it infuriated Lydia. She had spent years of her life tirelessly studying, working herself to the point of exhaustion, in order to learn and master the many powerful spells that she now knew. Yet within only a day, Alexi had not only mastered her newfound powers, she had managed to surpass Lydia herself.

The worst part of it all was how carefree she was with this power. She was taking advantage of it for no purpose other than her own enjoyment. She was acting recklessly and without any fear of consequence. If things kept going as they were, it was only a matter of time before Alexi made an irreversible mistake. Lydia knew that something had to be done. Sure she herself had wanted to take revenge against Widowwood, to make its residents suffer eternally beneath her, but she couldn't approve of Alexi's reckless methods. Lydia had to bring her daughter under control.

With those thoughts in mind, Lydia began to thrash against her bindings with all her strength. She put every ounce of her energy into tearing through them, but nothing she did was working. Alexi's magical bindings were too strong for Lydia to break free from, especially with her body in its current state... Wait, that was it! Magical bindings! As powerful as they were, the ropes tying Lydia's body up had no physical form. They were made entirely of Alexi's magic. Magic that Lydia herself had given her. Magic that Lydia could possibly absorb back into her body once more. Lydia knew that this was her only hope of escaping.

In the body of a doll, one with no muscles to aid its movements, her physical strength was abysmal at best. The only thing that even allowed this body to move at all was the limited magical power that her soul inherently possessed. Breaking out of the bonds through brute force was simply impossible for her now. Perhaps in her previous form, when she still possessed a superhuman level of strength, but not now. Her only option now was to use what little magic she still possessed and overpower the magic that was holding the bindings together. If she could do that, not only would she be freed from her restraints, but she would be able to absorb every bit of power that Alexi put into creating them. And judging by how thick the ropes were, Lydia could tell that that was a lot.

There was only one issue remaining: Would she actually be able to do it?

choices: Grow herself to match Alexi's height and take her on now.
Retreat to get more power and come back for Alexi later.
12112221222122.content:
(Note: Original chapter by: ForestFire5000)


Lydia knew she had to use every bit of magic that she possessed if this plan had any chance of working. This carried a great risk, as right now she was merely a soul inhabiting an otherwise inanimate object. The only thing keeping her soul anchored in the physical plane was that small amount of magic that Alexi used to resurrect her. If she did this and her plan failed, Lydia would cease to exist.

Without her, there wasn't a single person on the planet who stood a chance of opposing her daughter. With her gone, Alexi would no longer have anything that could stand in her way. If left unchecked, she could easily destroy not only Widowwood but the entire world as well. The fate of all life on the planet was at stake. Lydia wanted to rule over the world with an iron fist, not go on a mindless killing spree and destroy it. Alexi had to be stopped before she did just that. Even if she had to risk her own life to do it, Lydia knew that she was the only one who could. She brought this monster into the world. It was up to her to stop it.

Concentrating with everything she had, Lydia began to expel all of her magic into the bindings around her. Her magic clashed with Alexi's for dominance, and Lydia was being worn down. Alexi had poured an astounding amount of power into these bindings. It was almost as though she knew Lydia would attempt something like this in order to escape; surely this much magic was overkill if she only wanted to restrict Lydia's physical body. She clearly wanted to keep her power in check as well while she was gone.

Still, Lydia couldn't give in. She wouldn't let herself be defeated by her own daughter. Not like this. With a burst of willpower, Lydia's magic began to slowly eat away at the ropes that bound her. She could feel their energy flowing into her body as her own energy tore them apart. The more power Lydia drained from the magical ropes, the stronger she became, and the easier it became to absorb more. Soon Lydia's plan came to fruition, and the energy of the bindings was completely absorbed into her being. She was free at last, and now she had recovered a great deal of the power her daughter had stolen from her.

With a sizable portion of her power restored, Lydia got to her feet. A confident smirk spread across her face as she reveled in her newly regained power. Looking down at her body, however, Lydia was very disappointed. Despite the great power that once again flowed through her, she was still nothing but a doll. A doll made to resemble Alexi. And not the current Alexi, whose body had been transformed into one that would make even the most beautiful of women jealous. No, Lydia looked like the old childish Alexi, without a single noticeable curve in her entire figure. Not only that, but her plastic body was covered head to toe in scratches from being dragged through the woods, and her joints were still clogged with dirt and grass. Something had to be done about that.

Using a meager fraction of her power, Lydia proceeded to make adjustments to her body. The first thing was of course to repair the damage that had been done to her on the way here. As her body was bathed in a purple glow, Lydia felt a wonderful tingling sensation as every single scratch and imperfection on her plastic 'skin' instantly vanished. She then tapped each of her joints with her index finger, causing them to glow as all the dirt and grass that had been wedged into them vanished into thin air. With her joints cleaned out, Lydia could once again move freely and without pain.

The second adjustment that she made was to her appearance. Lydia couldn't stand being trapped in what was essentially the body of a prepubescent little girl. Her body soon began to glow red, and its shape began to morph. Within moments the glow faded, and there stood Lydia in all her former glory. While the doll joints still remained, Lydia's body was now an exact replica of her own before Alexi had devoured her. All of her former curves had been restored, and even if her body was made of plastic now, she still looked amazing.

Satisfied with her appearance for the time being, Lydia decided to...

Lydia knew that she was taking a big risk by confronting her daughter right now, but her pride and anger wouldn't let her do any less. This charade had gone on long enough, and she refused to let Alexi have her way any longer. Although her physical form was still rather weak, Lydia felt her greater knowledge of magic and spells, and greater degree of cunning, would more than mitigate her physical disadvantage.

"But, first things first," she whispered. "I'm not going to let her maintain a height advantage. That would look absurd."

Not wanting to waste her magical energies on enlarging herself, she instead began to siphon life energy from the forest around her. Tree and plants wilted and died in seconds, as she began to grow. In seconds, she'd grown to four times her former size, easily as large as her renegade daughter. The forest around her was a dried-out husk of its former self, but Lydia hardly cared.

"This should have been a sensual experience," she noted with irritation. "But I can barely feel anything in this worthless body. I'll need to create a new, organic one, as soon as I'm able. That can wait, however."

Sending a series of mighty trembles through the ground with each step, she made her way to the kingdom. "Who knows what nonsense Alexi has gotten up to, now?"

This was a good question; what was Alexi doing when Lydia arrived?

choices: Lydia goes along willingly with Alexi's plan &destroys the kingdom as her puppet
Lydia tries to resist and manages to break free of Alexi's control
121122212222.content:
Alexi wanted to demolish Widowwood. She wanted to make everyone there suffer for all the pain she had endured. And with all of this power she had gained, she knew she was more than capable of doing just that. Still, something about this seemed wrong. She realized that there was no way anyone would recognize her in her current form. With her newfound power she had gained a body that no girl her age could ever hope to have. Even compared to fully developed adults, there were few who possessed a figure more perfect than hers. The people whom she wanted revenge against only knew her as a child, not as the goddess that she had become. What they would see wouldn't be young Alexi demolishing their kingdom in an act of vengeance, it would be a cruel goddess tormenting them for her own amusement.

That wasn't the message that Alexi wanted to convey. She wanted the people to know exactly why she was doing what she was doing. To know that they brought all of this upon themselves by ignoring her as she suffered. To know that their destroyer wasn't some cosmic deity who chose them by sheer chance, it was their own karma biting them in the butt for not helping a defenseless little girl who had been suffering for years. As she thought about how to convey that message, Alexi looked down to her side and remembered the new form she had given her mother. Lydia was a doll now. A doll made to be an exact replica of Alexi as she looked on the day Lydia first took her in. Surely the people would be able to recognize that. A devilish smirk spread across Alexi's face as she gazed down at her mother. Lydia, noticing that her titanic daughter had stopped dragging her along the ground, struggled to get to her feet once again.

"Look at that, mommy. It's that pathetic little kingdom that you wanted so much to destroy!" Alexi said, pointing toward the kingdom in the distance.

Lydia didn't say a word.

"Awww, cat got your tongue? Maybe you're in too much pain to talk after I dragged you through the forest like that. Don't worry mommy, I'll fix you right up!"

Alexi then placed her hand against her mother's forehead and sent a pulse of magical energy through her. Lydia's body began to glow brightly as all the scratches on her plastic 'skin' instantly repaired themselves. The dirt and grass that was beginning to clog up her joints also vanished into thin air. Within moments, Lydia's body was as good as new. While she was glad to finally be relieved of the pain that she was enduring, the fact that her daughter had healed her after subjecting her to such torment in the first place made Lydia worry about what she had planned. Surely she had a reason for repairing the damage that she herself did to Lydia's body.

"I hope you're ready, mommy, because I've got a special job in store for you!" Alexi said as she undid the magical rope around her mother's neck and picked her up, cradling her in her arms like a baby.

"What do you mean by that, child?" Lydia said in her frustration.

"You're going to destroy all of Widowwood for me! Isn't that great? I'll be letting you do exactly what you wanted to, mommy!"

Lydia's mouth curled into a smile as she heard this. Even if the conditions behind it weren't exactly ideal, Lydia would still be able to get her revenge against the kingdom that had exiled her. Alexi stomped toward the kingdom walls with Lydia in her arms. With a simple jump her massive legs easily carried her over the massive walls, which were famous for having never been breached by any invading army before.

The walls were so thick that none could hope to break them, and so tall that none could hope to scale them, but Alexi managed to jump over that impenetrable defense like it was nothing. Once she was standing within the castle walls, Alexi grinned evilly as she watched the citizens panicking at her feet. Their fear was definitely understandable. Seeing a 200 foot tall girl carrying a 50 foot tall doll walk into your homeland would terrify anyone.

"Hello there, people of Widowwood. I bet you're wondering what a big girl like me is doing here in your cute little kingdom. Well, allow me to tell you a tale that will answer all these questions.

Once upon a time, there was an innocent little girl named Alexi. She was cute and kind, but sadly she was born into a terrible family. Every day, Alexi was abused by her cruel mother and father. Every day she cried out to her fellow citizens for help. And every single day she was ignored by all of them. Nobody cared about poor defenseless little Alexi. Only caring about themselves, the selfish citizens of Widowwood went about their daily lives, never paying any attention to the young Alexi's suffering. They all just watched as her parents beat her, belittled her, and made her life as miserable as possible. Finally, a day came when poor Alexi had had enough. She knew that nobody would do anything to help save her from her heartless family, so she decided to take things into her own hands. Gathering up what few possessions she owned, Alexi ran away from home and ventured out into the forest.

Alexi had always been all alone, so fending for herself in the woods was just like another day at home. Eventually, after wandering aimlessly for days on end looking for a place where she could belong, Alexi finally found what she was looking for. There in the middle of nowhere stood a tower, and in that tower lived a kind old witch. That witch was also from the kingdom of Widowwood just like Alexi, and she too knew the cruelty of its citizens. Taking pity on poor little Alexi, the witch decided to adopt her as a daughter and let her live in the tower with her. Life with that witch wasn't perfect. The poor witch herself was already struggling to get by on her own, and taking in a young girl only made things more difficult for her. Still, that new life even with all of its hardships was much better than the one that Alexi had abandoned. As time went by, the witch and the girl grew close. They became more of a family together than Alexi's old one ever was.

Life finally seemed to be looking up for the poor young girl named Alexi. But one day, the old witch who had become her mother gained a new spell. It was the ultimate spell, one that would grant its caster a near unlimited power. The witch planned to use this spell to get revenge on Widowwood and all the people who wronged her, and knowing of the grudge that Alexi held against the kingdom, she decided to grant her that power as well. Being imbued with the power of the witch's ultimate spell, Alexi was filled with joy. Finally, she would be able to get even with the kingdom that made her life miserable. She could finally get her revenge. Everything seemed to be going her way for the first time in her life! But sadly, such a perfect situation was not meant to be. As Alexi plotted her vengeance, the witch began to have a change of heart. She decided that she didn't want Alexi to fulfill her wishes after all, and told her that she couldn't go to Widowwood with her.

The witch wanted to have all the fun to herself. Overcome by greed, she betrayed her own daughter. This broke poor little Alexi. She had already been through so much suffering, and now the one person she had come to love and trust turned on her. Filled with an uncontrollable rage, Alexi began to use the power her mother gave her to grow. Bigger and bigger Alexi became, until she finally outgrew the very tower that she and the witch called home. Knowing that the witch would only interfere with her plans, Alexi decided that she had to be eliminated. This decision broke her fragile little heart, as the witch was the only person she had ever truly cared about. With a heavy heart and tears streaming down her cheeks, Alexi picked up the witch and plopped her into her mouth. Having devoured the witch and absorbed all of her powers, Alexi's body began to change. From the little girl she once was, her body transformed into something that would make any woman jealous. She became unimaginably beautiful.

However, even though Alexi now held everything she could have ever hoped for, she still felt empty inside. She longed for the companionship of the witch, the one person who treated her as a person whose life held value. With her incredible power, Alexi pulled the spirit of the witch from her stomach and planted it inside a doll. A doll that the witch had made for Alexi on the first day they met. One that was a mirror image of Alexi's former self. The witch had been reborn as Alexi's favorite doll, and now that doll is going to be the bringer of judgment! You will all pay for what you did to me!" Alexi cried out, ending her story.

With that, she gently placed Lydia onto the ground and patted her on the head. Instantly five magical threads shot from her fingers, connecting themselves to Lydia's wrists, ankles, and neck. With a flick of one of her fingers, Alexi made Lydia's body move on its own. Lydia felt her leg being lifted up before quickly slamming down once again. Her plastic bare foot flattened several panicked citizens beneath it as Alexi let out an evil laugh.

"Dance, my puppet! Dance and destroy everyone who made us both suffer!" Alexi said maliciously.

Lydia thought about what to do for a moment. If she went along with her daughters plan she could finally destroy the kingdom, even if it did mean being manipulated like a puppet in the process. On the other hand, the magic threads were much more thin than the rope Alexi strangled her with earlier. She could probably break free and escape if she tried hard enough...


What will Lydia do?

Alexi's former family, wanting to apologize to their titanic runaway daughter.
1211222122221.content:
Lydia didn't like being manipulated like this, being used as nothing more than a puppet by her own daughter. The whole situation was humiliating to her. She also didn't like how Alexi had claimed that she was in tears when she devoured her before. Alexi was most certainly not crying at the time. On the contrary, she couldn't have been happier as she sentenced her own mother to death in her stomach. There were so many things wrong with the current situation.

And yet, in spite of all that, Lydia didn't care one bit. Regardless of the circumstances, she was finally getting to have her revenge against the insolent kingdom of Widowwood. She had worked toward this goal for years, and if the means to achieving it involved becoming a puppet and being controlled by her own daughter, then so be it. None of that mattered to her right now. All that mattered to Lydia was that she would finally be able to feel the bodies of those who wronged her being crushed to a pulp beneath her feet. As long as she could finally make them suffer, Lydia was willing to endure the humiliation of being turned into her daughter's toy.

Alexi simply smiled down at her mother as she saw the look of pure sadistic satisfaction on her face. When her daughter didn't move her again, Lydia snapped at her.

"Well? What are you waiting for, child?! You're the one who put these strings on me! I can't move without you, so hurry up and work those fingers of yours! I want to make these vermin suffer! Isn't that what you wanted too?!"

"But of course, mommy. I was just waiting for you to ask. So, are you ready to become my puppet of destruction?"

"Like I said, I just want to put these insolent worms in their place! If that means becoming your puppet, then so be it! Make your move, child!"

"Hahahaha! Oh, with pleasure mommy! We're going to have so much fun with this!"

And at that, Alexi began to skillfully manipulate the magical strings and control her mother to do her bidding. Her fingers danced and Lydia's body followed, leaving nothing but death and destruction in her wake. The citizens of Widowwood could do nothing to stop the 50 foot tall doll from destroying their homes. They could only watch helplessly as her plastic fists crashed through the walls of their buildings, causing them to collapse in on themselves. Her colossal feet snuffed out dozens of insignificant lives with each passing minute, and try as they might the citizens were unable to outrun them.

Lydia, having no control over her body at the moment, simply relaxed and allowed her daughter to do all the work. She didn't care one bit that she was being used like this any more. All the embarrassment that she felt before had been driven away the instant she felt those first few bodies popping like grapes beneath her soles. With the angry villagers behind her, she was left with only one option. She lowered her shoulder and rammed him. His meaty skin flapped against her taut muscles, and with an unnatural scream he flew against the walls of the alley. The impact shattered several bones and set him bawling. Sari had no idea at her own strength! A little of her magic must have stayed, little enough that Lydia had failed to notice. She stopped running and walked back to the injured man. He tried to crawl away, but his broken ribs and arm kept him still. As the cruel face knelt down next to him he turned to whimpering. She scanned him like a lion inspects an injured gazelle. She reached out and grasped his face with two surprisingly soft hands, running them over his bristly chin while murmuring softly. He quieted down a moment, hearing more people come tearing around the corner. They stopped when they saw their target gently caressing an injured drunk. All was silent for a moment.

Sari's tender manner dropped suddenly. Her fingers dug into the man's skin and she yanked upwards. With barely any effort, her attacker's head and part of his spine left his body. She cried out in triumph and held it up like a trophy. She tasted the blood running down her bare arms. Its saltiness was even nicer now that she had killed her target as personally as she had. And she realized she had never killed another person when she was approaching person-sized. She threw the severed head at her foes, and it rolled to a stop just before their feet. Sari licked her fingers clean while staring at them, sizing them up, challenging them. Her eyes had adapted to the dark and let her count at least thirty of them. Sadly, she didn't know whether their courage would fail despite their numbers. Maybe she had just enough power left for...

"Come on, let's get her!" Someone yelled and threw a burning torch at her. She easily sidestepped it, and grinned. People never had needed much power to be brainwashed. She told one man clutching a pitchfork to run forward. The entire mass surged forward behind him. It didn't even matter that Sari dodged his thrust, tore the weapon from his hands, and ripped him to pieces with one hand. Holding the pitchfork in her other hand, she waited for the next person to come within range.
123121212121.title: Unbalanced

choices: Lydia is looming in the sky above her, and stops this
Sari succeeds, and begins to grown stronger
1231212121212.content:
Enjoying the new, incredibly visceral sensation of slaughtering humans in close proximity, Sari brandied her new weapon like a baton, gesturing to the unsteady crowd before her. "Come, now," she whispered, eyes wild with the though of impending carnage. "You were all so eager for my head, before. Who else thinks they can take it, hmm?"

This wasn't just mindless bravado, or a disconcerting bloodlust; Sari had a plan. If she was to reclaim her throne and put Lydia in her proper place, she needed to regain her powers. What's more, she needed to be willing to do what she hadn't, before, and give herself completely to the dark magics she drew energy from. Lydia had, and at the time, Sari thought that to be a brash mistake. Recent events had corrected this misconception. Now, Sari was ready to start rebuilding herself, into a stronger, larger, and more deadly creature than ever before.

A blood sacrifice of these fools and their souls would be a perfect way to start.

Since no one seemed ready to take her offer, Sari decided to force the issue, and charged the crowd. As she anticipated, plenty of them had the good sense to scatter. But many also met her charge, in an ultimately futile attempt to slay her. She'd been dangerous enough with her feral cruelty and enhanced strength, but now that she actually had a weapon, they were doomed before they began. She ran through a half dozen men before stopping long enough to realize that all her opponents lie dead at her feet.

"Well, this is a start, at least," she allowed, dipping her hand in a small pool of blood and painting arcane symbols on the ground beneath her. She began to chant, planning to drain the soul energy of her fresh kills...
1231212121212.title: Have A Go, If You Think You're Hard Enough

choices: Sari can't move
Lydia shows up
12312121212122.content:
Sari knew she was taking a risk. If Lydia was nearby, she would sense this use of magic and probably eradicate the entire town. But she had little choice otherwise, so she had to try. Her chant continued and the souls began to rise from the dead. They screamed in terror and agony as Sari's own soul absorbed them, sucking them dry before sending them away through a rift in realms. Sari did not know where they went, and hoped she would never end there. Every now and then, if she watched her victims plunge into this strange realm, she would see something watch her back. Something more powerful even than Lydia. And far more cruel. As soon as the souls were gone Sari closed the rift. She could feel it approaching.

Her fear and sense of weakness was entirely gone when she focused again on the real world. She had grown to the height of fifteen feet and felt much more powerful. Lydia could rarely use human souls to gain her power, as magicians the world over had renounced this form. She would bring down indescribable suffering had she tried before her ascension. Now, Sari would bet she didn't even try because she considered herself a goddess. She smirked. Her master was quite predictable. If she used this method, she might even be able to challenge her soon. Sari forced her buxom form out of the alley, not an easy task. She was confronted by real city guards in full outfit and many more armed peasants. Sari almost regretted being her size. Killing them at their own height would have been very fun.

With a shout of malice, she crushed the most elaborately armored guard in front of her. She ground him into the cobblestone, listening to his armor crunch and bones shatter. The rest were almost paralyzed with fear. Sari raised her hands like a puppet master over the mass before her. She waved her fingers, making a few of the pikemen march towards her. Mechanically, their only emotion being terror in their eyes, they marched closer to the woman. In unison, they raised their pikes and jabbed Sari in the legs. Their steel weapons scraped or bounced off her gorgeous legs amid her laughter. She viciously kicked at them, and they flew backwards to land amid the crowd. Some brave souls in the back fired arrows at her. Sari giggled and lightly sprang out of the way, landing in the middle of the guards. She swept in front of her, flinging them aside like rag dolls. Her feet pounded them to armored paste as they futilely slashed and jabbed at her lower half. Someone behind her poked her in a sensitive area, eliciting a squeak very out of character for an avatar of destruction. She turned, mashing a man under her foot, and spotted the perpetrator. She yanked his spear from his hands and snapped it in half. After using it to skewer a fleeing guard, she thundered over to the other. Standing directly above him, she practically roared down at him.

"You are not worthy of touching a goddess so!" Sari had to restrain hysterical laughter as she watched his abject terror. Maybe she should stop draining their strength to augment her own. It wasn't like they could hurt her anyway, now they'd just stare as she singled them out and killed them. But she could be crushed by one even bigger any moment, so she might savor the moment.

"But being kind, I will allow it. Come here!" She said, making one final adjustment. Then she began to lower herself, her nether regions brushing against the paralyzed man's helmet. She kept getting lower, forcing the metal headpiece against her wetness. Eventually, the man beneath her was forced downwards. Sari finally had him pinned, his head partially stuck inside of her. The absolute power still dazzled her, even after she had felt dozens of other people his size disappear into her at once. At the thought of this, her maw quivered, crushing the man's head. With a laugh, she stood and killed the rest of them in the cruelest ways possible. The humans didn't stand a chance against her sadism and size. The streets were paved in bodies and Sari was practically soaked from head to foot in blood and body parts. Just clearing space to redraw the necessary symbols was a task. But the power that flowed into her from the town's people was unimaginable. The rush was even better than feeling the poor conscript's helmet against her crotch. Sari felt carnal desires wash over her as more and more energy was channeled from the humans and into her. She didn't pay attention to what was happening with their disposal until too late.

A force washed over her. Similar to Lydia's power after climbing from the crater, but colder, meaner, and stronger. In terror, Sari tried to shut down the rift and absorb the rest of the souls entirely into her essence instead. But when the rift was merely a crack, the being on the other side pulled it open. Sari pulled back in terror. That wasn't supposed to be possible. Even at her colossal height of 800 feet, she was petrified. From seemingly nowhere a figure had appeared far below her. It hobbled along the wreckage with a came, back hunched over and wearing a dull khaki robe. Despite its frail appearance, Sari knew it held untold power. She stepped backwards onto a small inn to get farther away from it.

"Dearest friend, do not run," it said in a voice larger than its form.
12312121212122.title: Sari succeeds, and begins to grown stronger

Lydia stays
123121212121221.content:
To her horror, Sari found she couldn't move at all. She was frozen as the small being slowly hobbled closer. The robed form limped forward leaning heavily on an old wooden staff. It seemed entirely unaffected by the sea of bodies it had to walk through. The being stopped a few feet short of her gore-caked foot.

"Why did you need to do this? Have these people done anything to you?" It asked mildly reproachfully. It waved it's staff over the devastated area. Sari watched in amazement as the broken bodies slowly knitted themselves back together, blood pooled into separate puddles and flowed back into its original body. Most of the people stood idly, their faces fixed in blank stares. A few started screaming uncontrollably. Others felt themselves and took the moment to run from their colossal killer. Sari would have said something, but the figure had not yet released her.

"Hmm. Where are their essences? At his is most unusual. The newly dead do not show such reluctance to return to their world. How could their souls have drifted so far..." His voice trailed off. Sari sensed his anger as his minuscule head swivelled back towards her. The very heat seemed to be sucked from the air and the sun dimmed visibly.
"In many places such magic would get you punished. You are lucky the Imperium does not often inspect your realm. Do you know what you dabble in, witch? It is not your place to alter a soul. Mayhaps I should tear them from yours and restore those you defiled!" Sari was scared for a moment, but anger quickly rose to replace it. She felt the bonds loosen and she seized her chance.

"Who are you to tell a goddess what it is or is not okay to do? You speak of Imperiums. I have consumed entire empires in less than a day! This will be just another to feed my hunger!" She yelled down. She struggled against the coils that rooted her to the ground to crush this pathetic being, but she could not. Even worse, she sensed its amusement.

"You are no goddess. I have seen goddesses, and even the weakest among them could erase you with a swipe of a finger. If you knew what I was compared to them, then you would speak more civilly. And if I myself fear the Imperium, they should be your worst nightmare. But regardless. I come to find another. Recently, there was a goddess born here. And I wish to find her. You will assist me." He stated. Sari sneered.

"I will not help one like you. Assuming the size of the slaves demeans true power. Even in this form I could easily have restored some animation to a shell. Cheap tricks is all you have." She felt the bonds loosen. She was able to bend over and grab one of the tinies recently crushed and then restored. But to her terror, it was different.
"How is it possible that you erase death?" She gasped, practically dropping the human. Instead, she gently replaced it on the ground. The being laughed a deep, rumbling laugh.

"A lord of death can easily enough undo it. But what can completely erase it but the true master of the thing? Any god or goddess can demand death in their name. What makes me special is that I demand life." With these words came dull realization of what Sari had allowed into their world. She had read about this one night when Lydia was out. It had been a large book kept deep in her deepest cells. Sari had wondered why a simple book would have such protections on it. After reading it, it had seemed like nothing more than a book of myths and legends. But this tome must have been so much more. 'Forgive me Lydia, I made a mistake,' Sari thought hopelessly. Her former master wouldn't stand a chance. Despite the attempt on her life, Sari found she still loved Lydia in a small way. So when an 800 foot shadow fell over the city followed by the sharp demanding shout of "What's this?", Sari tried to tell Lydia to run. But at the sound of stone being crushed beneath giant feet she knew it was too late. The mysterious force had frozen her again.

"Sari, what have you done?" Lydia gasped as she felt the presence.

"So, the beast recognizes its master!" The figure said playfully. Sari recalled the one line that brought her assurance at night, thinking it meant this thing had long ago died. But now she realized it had meant something completely different. With strange eons, even death may die.

1231212122.content:
Before Sari could enact her spell to subdue her larger lover, Lydia got to her feet in a single motion that was far too fast for something of her size. With a casual motion, she grabbed the smaller titaness by the neck, throwing her back to the ground.

"Do you really think I couldn't sense your treachery?" Lydia laughed coldly, stomping upon Sari where she lay. "You're jealous of my newfound power and beauty. As well you should be. This entire universe will soon exist to do nothing but feed my hungers. Sadly, it seems that you would rather surrender your chance to rule at my side. Oh, well."

Sari was still reeling from the attack, not able to defend herself as Lydia violently kicked her again. She hadn't felt pain since her ascension, and now, it was overwhelming her.

But she still had one card to play. If she couldn't overpower Lydia, she'd simply displace her. Beginning to chant, she opened a portal near Lydia's feet, hoping to send the power-mad giantess to another realm entirely.

Lydia didn't seem to notice her efforts, or didn't care, if she did. "Trying to flee?" she sneered, kneeling next to her fallen ex. "I don't think so."

With a final burst of exertion, Sari made her move.

Lydia met Sari's kiss, melting into it without hesitation. The younger giantess thought she had won, and moaned her approval as Lydia began to pull her closer, groping at her enormous form. Lydia ground their hips together obscenely, trying to guide her lover to the ground. Sari, aroused beyond belief, eagerly obliged, lying on her back and destroying a large swath of the forest beneath her gigantic ass. Lydia eagerly straddled her, eyes wild with lust.

And then, the situation quickly changed. Rather than continue to embrace her, Lydia's hands instead clutched Sari's wrists tightly, pinning the younger girl to the ground. Before Sari could issue a protest, Lydia slammed her body on top of her apprentice's, knocking the wind out of her, and subduing her for the moment.

"So sorry, my little traitor," Lydia purred. "But you don't get off the hook so easily. Yes, it's true; I felt a certain soft spot towards you. And I certainly lusted for you, for many years. But you had to push things too far. You had to challenge the natural order. And that order is, I. Am. Supreme. So now, you'll suffer the consequences of your decision."

Sari frowned. "But..but you care for me...you just said..."

"Which is the only reason your head is still attached to your body," she noted. "You'll live. But not as the goddess you could have been. No, you're not even going to be my apprentice. You're a toy for my delight. A pet. My sex slave. Whatever you want to call it. I desire your body, Sari, and I'll have it. Your thoughts on the matter are inconsequential."

With that, Lydia moved her face close to the monstrous girl's neck, and took a long, slow, lick up the side of her face, moaning slightly. "You taste sweeter than I would have imagined," she whispered huskily. "Just give in, dear; you can enjoy yourself. I will, regardless."
12312122.title: Reasserting Command

choices: Sari flees for Widowwood, leading Lydia to the kingdom
Sari opens a portal to a new world...ours
123122.content:
Despite her best efforts, Sari couldn't get in the right frame of mind to grow to match Lydia's enormous size. She was simply too cold to be able to summon that type of rage at the drop of a hat. Continued flight was her only option. Unfortunately, as the thunderous footsteps of her pursuer grew ever-closer, Sari also realized that if left to flight alone, she was practically doomed. Lydia could cross entire fields in a single gigantic step, and Sari had no hope of outrunning her in a fair race.

She had to think strategically, or she'd be little more than a smear under her master's foot.

Her first impulse was to make a break for Widowwood. Not only could she more easily hide in its mass of people, but the sight of that hated kingdom might take Lydia's attention off of her traitorous apprentice. If the giant mage got distracted in leveling her old enemies, Sari might be able to slip away to safety in the confusion and chaos.

But wait, Sari realized. She was thinking like a mortal, when her new powers made her so much more. Why bother fleeing through forests, when she could flee through realities? It would be so simple to open a portal to another world, and escape into it. True, Lydia might be able to sense such a use of magic, but Sari would have enough of a head-start to ensure her survival and plot her revenge.

Another of Lydia's footsteps caused an earthquake so profound that Sari stumbled, practically falling to her knees. She didn't have time to debate these options any longer.
123122.title: Avenues of Escape

choices: Follow Lydia, as she begins her conquest of the medieval world
Follow Sari, as she begins her conquest of the modern world
1231222.content:
Sari knew all too well how limited her options were. In a head to head fight, Lydia was leaps and bounds beyond her in power. She wouldn't stand a ghost of a chance. With Lydia's new titanic stature, there was no way for Sari to outrun her. Her legs could cover more ground in a single step than Sari's could in a hundred. Fleeing was hopeless. She would be trapped in Lydia's hand long before she managed to lure her master to Widowwood. Even the cover of the trees above her was useless, as Lydia's incredible magic would allow her to sense where her apprentice was hiding instantly.

Only one option remained. If a head on fight was out of the picture, and trying to escape to Widowwood would be futile, then the only choice Sari had was to flee into another dimension. Surely Lydia would track her down. She would follow her to the ends of reality in order to exact her revenge. But isolating her location in another dimension would take time. Time that Sari could use to learn the ins and outs of her new powers, and master them completely. Then she would be able to fight on even ground with her former master.

Concentrating her magic into the palm of her hand, Sari focused her energy into each of her fingernails. Preparing for the moment of truth, she took a deep breath and pulled back her hand. In one fluid motion, she swung her hand forward and raked her claws through the air. As her magic-coated fingernails swung through the air, they tore a hole in the fabric of reality. With a devious grin, she wedged both of her hands into that tear and pulled it apart. Tearing open her portal, Sari proceeded to jump forward into it.

At the last second Lydia saw her, but as she reached down her massive hand to grab her, the only thing that was wrapped in her fingers was thin air. She as too late. Sari had escaped.

"Dammit! How could that traitorous wench have escaped me?! *sigh* Oh well, no matter... She can enjoy her freedom while it lasts. I've got bigger things to deal with at the moment. Soon this world will be mine, and once I've conquered this world, I'll go after her. Then I can punish her for her insolence and add another world to my domain at the same time! I'll be killing two birds with one stone!" Lydia said with a laugh. She then turned her attention toward her true prize: The kingdom of Widowwood.

Meanwhile, as Lydia stomped off to begin taking over her own world, Sari had just exited her portal and appeared in the modern world. She laughed as she looked around at her surroundings. She was in the center of a massive city. Buildings of unimaginable size, even a couple that would make the current Lydia look small, surrounded her from every direction. She was absolutely speechless as she took in the majesty of her surroundings. Sari was amazed by how advanced everything was in this new world. The technology of this world made that of her homeland look like the stone age.

She was almost intimidated by it all, but one thing made her overflow with confidence. This world had no magic. Sari had scanned around when she first arrived. She was certain that a society this advanced must have mastered levels of witchcraft that would rival even Lydia's, but she was pleasantly surprised. This society, as far as it had come in the development of technology, had never discovered even the most basic of magics. It was almost laughable, really. Even a 3 year old toddler in her own world could manipulate simple levitation spells, but this world knew absolutely nothing!

Sari had already won. As great as their technology was, no amount of technology could ever hope to compete with the power of magic. Especially not magic on the level that she was now able to wield. Sari wouldn't even have to try in order to take over this world. They would be helpless before her within mere minutes. Sari laughed maniacly as she thought about it. With a flick of her wrist, she sent a bolt of magical energy at a nearby building, and watched in sadistic glee as the towering structure burst into flames before her eyes. This was it. It was the dawn of a new age for this world. This was the beginning of the age of Goddess Sari.

The two witches had begun their conquests. Though they knew nothing of what the other was doing, they were both bringing an entire world to its knees at the exact same time. Lydia in her homeworld, and Sari in this new modern world.


Whose conquest do you want to follow?
1231222.title: Sari's modern day debut

Lydia changes in another way
12312221.content:
As she took one thunderous step after another, getting closer and closer to her goal, Lydia's smile grew wider and darker. In a perverse sense, she should be thankful to Sari; without her outrageous affront, Lydia wouldn't have tapped into her rage so deeply, and wouldn't have expanded to this glorious size. She took a moment to rub her hands over her enormous figure, cupping her bountiful breasts before teasing her taut tummy, and spending a few seconds sliding between her legs. Yes, this was good. When she found Sari, perhaps she would spare the traitor's life, in gratitude for this unexpected gift.

Or perhaps she'd crush her beneath her feet. It was still up in the air at this point.

The kingdom of Widowwood couldn't help but be aware of the giantess' approach, and those valiant souls perched along the watchtowers quickly readied their bows to fire on the attacking monstrosity. Their weapons...were for naught. The arrows couldn't even pierce Lydia's skin, and only managed to make her body tremble with spiteful laughter.

"Ohh, you'll have to do better than that," she purred. "And really, was that any way to greet your favorite daughter, Widowwood? See what I've made of myself, after you cast me out?"

Her eyes grew darker as she remembered that day. "Yes, you sent me off to die, rather than allow me to help you. I was alone for years, with nothing but my hatred of you all to guide me. Hatred...and rage..."

As the emotions flooded back, a terrifying transformation was taking place. Before the terrified eyes of everyone in Widowwood, Lydia was growing, again...
12312221.title: The Return

choices: Lydia exacts her revenge on the kingdom of Widowwood, and nothing can stop her
Sari returns, having grown to Lydia's size, and Lydia turns her attention to her
123122212.content:
The citizens of Widowwood could do nothing but watch in horror as Lydia's rage began to build, the look on her face showing nothing but pure undiluted hatred. Her fury was allowing her to tap into even greater powers, powers to great for her to control. Soon her own magic began to overwhelm her. Lydia cried out in pain as the dark energy welled up withing her. Her own magic burned through her skin and escaped from her body, condensing into a massive purple cloud which engulfed her entire body. All the citizens who so much as looked at this cloud felt their bodies become paralyzed with fear, the sight of it emanating a wave of pure hatred.

Lydia's screams of pain were soon silenced as the cloud of darkness solidified into a thick black cocoon that trapped her within it. The citizens could only stare helplessly at the colossal shell. They were forced to gaze upon it in horror, for they knew that whatever would emerge from such a vile shell would surely be their end. They could neither see nor hear anything of the transformation that was taking place within, and thus could only imagine what kind of monstrosity would be born from it.

Inside the cocoon, Lydia's body was beginning to change. She was no longer in pain anymore. No, much the opposite. As she sat in that magical prison and observed her body's transformations, she was overwhelmed by a wave of euphoria like nothing she had ever felt before. Not even she was completely sure what was happening to her, but she was sure of one thing; she liked it. She knew that she was becoming stronger, faster, more powerful in every way. She couldn't wait to see the looks of horror on those pathetic citizens' faces when she finally emerged from her cocoon and revealed to them her new body.

Back on the outside, the long wait was finally coming to an end. For the longest time there were no signs of anything happening to the massive black cocoon, but now a crack had appeared on its surface. At first it was just a single small crack in the shell, but soon more and more began to appear. And then at last, the moment of truth came. Lydia's arm thrust upward, breaking a hole through the top of the cocoon. She then reached her other arm through that hole and pulled the now-brittle shell apart. The magic that made up the cocoon quickly dissipated as the shell fell to the ground and shattered, and the energy was instantly reabsorbed into Lydia's new body.

There she stood, looking down on all the pathetic citizens in all her titanic glory. Lydia had undergone a horrific transformation, and now she glared down at her prey once again. Not with her previous expression of utter contempt, but with a cruelly playful smirk that somehow was even more terrifying to them. It was now clear that Lydia wasn't blinded by rage any longer. She was now fully aware of her surroundings and her actions once more. She knew exactly what she was doing, and she was enjoying it. The citizens didn't know how to respond to what they saw. Where the titanic but still mostly human looking Lydia once stood, there was now a creature that could only be described as a demoness straight from the fiery pits of hell.

Her lightly tanned skin had been burned away as her magic escaped her earlier, and the skin that regenerated in its place was a vibrant shade of red. Her horns had become much more defined, moving from her forehead to the sides of her head and becoming much bigger than before. On her back were a pair of bat-like wings, the same shade of red as her skin, and from her rear she had grown a demonic tail. In the corners of her mouth a pair of pointed fangs were visible, and her long black hair had become as white as snow. Her ears came to a point like elf ears, and her nails extended into razor sharp claws. Lydia's new body had become the perfect figure of feminine appeal, with curves that would make even her previous form pale in comparison.

Lydia laughed to herself as she realized what had just happened to her. Her rage and hatred had released the limiters that kept her power in check, and it had quickly become too much for her old body to handle. Since the magic needed an adequate vessel to be contained within, it transformed her into a form that was more suitable for the vast amounts of power she had just acquired. She had become more powerful than she had ever intended.

"Well, this is an unexpected development. Anyway, lets have some fun, little insects!" Lydia said as she took her first step in her new form.

Her massive foot slammed down to the ground, grinding dozens of helpless citizens into a paste beneath her sole, their bloodstains blending in with the red of Lydia's skin. At this first hostile act, the entire kingdom flew into a panic. All of them began to run for their lives, doing anything that they could to escape Lydia's wrath. She simply laughed a malicious laugh as she glared down at them.

"Run all you want, worms! You'll never escape from me! From this day forward, I own every single one of your insignificant little lives!" Lydia said as she continued to ravage the kingdom.


What happens next?
123122212.title: Lydia's demonic new form

"Oh, don't run away, little ones," she noted with a sultry tone in her voice. "We'll have so much fun!" Having transformed entirely into a demon, Lydia was practically in ecstasy. With her new powers, and the hated kingdom lying at her feet, she planned to bring about hell on earth for these insignificant ants who had dared to banish her.
